name: inContactTest
description: Extracts InContact metrics from Windows Performance Counters

paramSchema.title: Metric Name
paramSchema.name: metric_name
paramSchema.description: The 'Name' of the metric in Pulse that will contain data for this perf counter.

paramSchema.title: Metric Short Name
paramSchema.name: metric_short_name
paramSchema.description: The 'Short name' of the metric in Pulse that will contain data for this perf counter.

paramSchema.title: Metric Identifier
paramSchema.name: metric_identifier
paramSchema.description: The 'Identifier' of the metric in Pulse that will contain data for this perf counter. You must manually create a metric before entering this definition here.

paramSchema.title: Counter
paramSchema.name: counter
paramSchema.description: The full windows performance counter path

paramSchema.title: Multiplier
paramSchema.name: multiplier
paramSchema.description: An integer value to multiply the counter value by. Default: 1
